item.title: Add/edit alias
item.description: Add / Edit aliasIn this page, there are 2 fields displayed: Alias: this field is mandatory. When trying to save and if the field is empty, the following error message is displayed: “Aliases and results are both required.” A tooltip for this field is displayed: “Enter each alias separated by a comma (e.g. ‘prestshop,preztashop,prestasohp’). Forbidden characters: <>;=#{}” Result: this field is mandatory. When trying to save and if the field is empty, the following error message is displayed: “Aliases and results are both required.
